channel.title: Linuxes on devopstales
channel.description: Recent content in Linuxes on devopstales

item.title: Install Rundeck
item.description: Rundeck is open source software that powers self-service operations.

item.title: Install Nextcloud
item.description: Nextcloud is a suite of client-server software for creating and using file hosting services. Nextcloud application functionally is similar to Dropbox.

item.title: Install Redmine
item.description: Redmine is a free and open source, web-based project management and issue tracking tool. I will install it on Ubuntu becous on CetOS there in no pre build package for redmine.

item.title: Install Openproject
item.description: Openproject is a free and open source, web-based project management and issue tracking tool.
